i1.blurb: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% Health deal 6-10% of the target's maximum Health as bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Zed's''' [[basic attack]]s against targets {{sti|health|{{as|below 50% '''maximum''' health}}}} deal {{as|{{pp|3|key=%|6 to 10|1;7;17}} of target's '''maximum''' health}} as {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.
''Contempt for the Weak'' can only affect the same target once every few seconds.
i1.name: Contempt for the Weak
notes: * The enhanced attack applies other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal but does not affect structures.

* ''Contempt for the Weak'' can be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, negated if ''Zed'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} (the enhanced attack is not consumed in all cases) and {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}} (the enhanced attack is consumed).

q1.blurb: Zed and his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, dealing damage to any targets they pass through.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' throw their spinning blades in the target direction, each dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies they pass through, reduced to 60% against units beyond the first.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 220}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Secondary Damage|{{ap|80*0.6 to 220*0.6}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.name: Razor Shuriken
notes: * A [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow's'' ''{{ai|Razor Shuriken}}'' will deal full damage when hitting an enemy before '''Zed's''' does (his will deal reduced damage).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only one {{ai|Razor Shuriken||Shuriken}}.

w1.blurb: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 5 seconds, and mimicking his spell casts. Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow.
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Zed's''' [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' dashes in the target direction, remaining in place for 5 seconds and being able to mimic ''{{ai|Razor Shuriken}}'' and ''{{ai|Shadow Slash}}'' while in range of each other.
'''Zed''' restores {{sti|{{as|energy}}}} whenever a [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' lands a mimicked ability on the same target he does. This may only happen once per cast ability.
{{sbc|Second Cast - Shadow Swap:}} While in range of each other, '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' {{tip|blink}} to their respective locations, swapping places.
w1.name: Living Shadow
notes: * The [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' grants {{tip|sight}} of its surroundings and is {{tip|untargetable}}.

e1.blurb: Zed and his shadow spin their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy. The shadow's spin slows.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' slash, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to surrounding enemies.

Enemies hit by a [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow's'' ''Shadow Slash'' are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but instead are slowed by a 50% stronger slow.
Each enemy champion hit by '''Zed's''' slash reduces ''{{ais|Living Shadow}}'' {{stil|cooldown}} by 2 seconds.
e1.name: Shadow Slash
notes: * ''Shadow Slash'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Zed's''' previous orders.

r1.blurb: Zed leaves a shadow behind and dashes to target Champion, marking them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing a percentage of the damage Zed has dealt while the mark was active. If the Champion dies under Death Mark, Zed can gain a portion of their attack damage.
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Zed''' {{tip|vanish|vanishes}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds during which he {{tip|dashes}} through the target enemy champion, {{as|marking|buzzword}} them, becoming {{tip|ghosted}} for 3 seconds, and spawning a [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' at the cast location which lasts for 6 seconds. After {{fd|0.5}} seconds of his reappearance he can activate ''{{ai|Death Mark 2||Death Mark Shadow}}''.

For the next 3 seconds, the {{as|mark|buzzword}} stores a percentage of all pre-mitigation {{as|physical|AD}} and {{as|magic|AP}} damage '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' deal to the target, detonating at the end of the duration to deal {{as|physical damage}}.

{{sbc|Second Cast - Death Mark Shadow:}} Regardless of distance between each other, '''Zed''' and the ''Death Mark'' [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' {{tip|blink}} to their respective locations, swapping places.
r1.name: Death Mark
notes: * If the target dies before '''Zed''' reaches them to apply the {{as|mark|buzzword}}, ''Death Mark'' is canceled, goes on a {{tt|reduced cooldown|5 seconds}}, and '''Zed''' reappears at the cast location.
* The {{as|mark|buzzword}} can be prevented by becoming {{tip|untargetable}} before it is applied (untargetability after application will not prevent the mark's detonation).
* ''Death Mark's'' [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' is functionally the same as a regular one.
* ''Death Mark's'' stored damage is taken from all [[Champion ability|abilities]], [[item]]s, and [[buff]]s.

* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block the {{as|mark's|buzzword}} application as well as '''Zed's''' {{tip|untargetable|untargetability}} and dash. They will not block the detonation from a {{as|mark|buzzword}} that is already applied.
